tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I got dental treatment done from Dr Sumit Dubey at Dr. Dubey's Dental Clinic in Lajpat Nagar, which is an excellent choice for anyone looking for Root Canal treatment, Zirconia Crowns,  Wisdom tooth removal and  orthodontic treatment. The clinic is clean and well-maintained, with state-of-the-art equipment and a highly skilled team of dental surgeons .

The staff at Dr. Dubey's Dental Clinic are friendly and professional, making patients feel comfortable and at ease. They take the time to explain the various treatment options available and help patients choose the best one for their needs.

reply_text: Thank you so much for the lovely feedback..much appreciate your words. Thank you for trusting and having faith in dentist team of our centre.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I recently had an implant and zirconia cap procedure done by Dr. Dubey, a skilled and professional dentist in Lajpat Nagar. From start to finish, Dr. Dubey was attentive and thorough in his approach. He took the time to explain the procedure to me, answered all my questions, and made sure I was comfortable throughout. The implant and zirconia cap were done flawlessly, and I was very impressed with the final result. Dr. Dubey also provided clear aftercare instructions, which helped me to ensure proper healing and maintenance of my new teeth. Overall, I would highly recommend Dr. Dubey for anyone seeking dental care in Lajpat Nagar.
reply_text: Thank you so very much.. your feedback is very encouraging and inspiring. Keep smiling.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: Coming from a reputed family of doctors, Dr Sumit Dubey is very much concerned about the overall well being of his patients. He is genuinely professional and warm towards them. He is open to answer our miscellaneous queries all along which helps in creating a comfort factor towards the treatment regimen. His clinical set up and his overall approach towards the patient and his/her treatment generate trust of being in competent and right hands. Last but not the least, his parting smile is quite reassuring!
reply_text: Thank you so much for kind words.. infact you and your family has been very cordial, generous &  punctual during all dental visits.. I am happy to get connected to like minded souls..  much regards üåªüôè
